name: Little Ghost Flower
description:
Little Ghost Flower is a co-op "flower-defense" game. Protect the flowers you plant from being eaten by the ghosties!

This is the first game released funded by Patreon. Special thank you to my Patreon backers for their support!
If you like my work, please consider supporting me by becoming my patron. Your support helps me make more games!

While technically designed to be multiplayer, it can certainly be played by one's self; it's just a little more challenging.
